title: Man's Eternal Quest
description: For all who have ever sought to understand the enigmas of life, for those who have held within their hearts an uncertain hope about the reality of God, and for seekers who have already turned toward the Supreme in their quest, this anthology of talks by the author of Autobiography of a Yogi offers illuminating insights and encouragement. In its pagese, Paramahansa Yogananda explores little-known and rarely explained aspects of such subjects as meditation, life after death, health and healing, the unlimited powers of the human mind, the equality of man and woman, and the interrelatedness of all life.Topics include:* Making Religion Scientific* Will Jesus Reincarnate?* Three Paths to Cosmic Consciousness* The Dream Nature of the World
author: Paramahansa Yogananda
